channel.title: MsBullet SDK on MsBullet
channel.description: Recent content in MsBullet SDK on MsBullet

item.title: StyleCop Analyzers
item.description: StyleCop Analyzers. # This analyzer is provided as a built-in tool of MsBullet SDK to enforce standard code conventions How to use and customization. # By default, there is no application of specific configurations within the SDK. NOTE For customization of the rules of this tool, you can refer to the official documentation Property Description Default value Overridable Note StyleCopConfig Specifies the file path of stylecop.
